sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Action) When required to make a Knowledge skill check, the character can instead make a Bought Info action. He spends a number of credits equal to 50 times the difficulty of the check and counts as succeeding on the check with one uncanceled success. At the GM's discretion, the character may not be able to use this ability if the information sought is particularly hard to find, or if the character is in a situation where he coul dnot purchase information (such as marooned on a planet with no access to the holonet).</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Bought Info</name> <number>TAL0001274</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-12 05:30:45</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7132487f2fdca090e0f497eef699b6ca</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-12 05:30:45</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
